item.title: Report E-2024080492
item.description:
Report E-2024080492

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-22T18:16:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-06
  • City: JANESVILLE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 6, 2024, three (3) 5-gallon pails of paint were damaged in transit and released approximately two (2) gallons of product to the trailer floor and surrounding freight. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from HazChem Environmental (HCE) to remediate the impacted site. HCE personnel utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the impacted trailer floor, then containerized them in one (1) 55-gallon drum. All impacted absorbents were containerized in one (1) additional 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report E-2024080497

  • Description: XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XTM. It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of AMERCOAT 370 WHITE RESIN was released from two 1-gallon metal pails due to improper loading by terminal NMP. T
